labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: You have an excuse to avoid your aunt's people watching fruit
data.expected_result: You can pause your extremely important Vine to "listen" to your aunt tell you gossip about the neighbors
data.short_description: Vine Embeds have no Pause/Stop button
data.steps_to_repro: - Link a Vine (with embeds) - be interrupted by someone wanting your attention - try to pause
